title: About Me
intro: Hi, I'm a Computer Science student and developer
introText: I build software and applications as part of my studies and personal projects. I enjoy working on practical systems, backend development, and learning new tools through real projects.
journeyText: I am currently studying Computer Science and working on team-based and personal projects focused on application and backend development. I have experience working in collaborative environments and following structured development workflows.
whatIDoText: I work on software projects involving backend systems, databases, APIs, and application logic, both individually and in team environments.
skillsText:
• Game development and gameplay systems
• Learning new programming tools and frameworks
• Backend and system-oriented development
• 3D and technical tools such as Blender
• Experimenting with personal software and game projects
philosophyText: I prefer working on practical projects where I can learn by building, testing, and improving real systems. I enjoy problem-solving, understanding how systems work behind the scenes, and continuously improving my development skills.
outsideText: Outside of school and development work, I spend time on personal projects, experimenting with tools, and learning new technologies at my own pace.
